symptoms.name: Wheezing
symptoms.pattern: May be present in allergic bronchopulmonary aspergillosis (ABPA)

symptoms.name: Fever
symptoms.pattern: May be present in invasive aspergillosis

symptoms.name: Organ-specific symptoms
symptoms.pattern: Depends on the affected organ; may include respiratory distress, hemoptysis, etc.

vital_signs.respiratory_rate: May be elevated in severe cases

physical_findings: Findings may vary depending on the type and severity of aspergillosis
May include abnormal lung sounds (wheezes, rales) in ABPA or invasive aspergillosis

lab_values.blood_tests: May show elevated inflammatory markers (e.g., ESR, CRP)

imaging_findings.chest_x_ray: May show opacities, nodules, or cavities
imaging_findings.CT_scan: Provides more detailed images of lung lesions

required: Positive Aspergillus culture or detection of Aspergillus antigens
